price: i da smo im dali da se njome služe – na nekim jašu, a nekima se hrane,
arabic: وَذَلَّلۡنَٰهَا لَهُمۡ فَمِنۡهَا رَكُوبُهُمۡ وَمِنۡهَا يَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wadhallalnāhā lahum famin'hā rakūbuhum wamin'hā yakulūna
